mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(PK_AD_NUM)+1, 0) FROM AD
INSERT INTO AD(PK_AD_NUM, AD_TITLE, PK_SAWON_CODE, AD_CONTENT, AD_DOCSTATUS, AD_DOCSTEP, PK_DOCTYPE_NUM, AD_DEPT_NAME, AD_DOCSIGNPATH, AD_MOD_DATE, AD_INT_DATE, AD_DELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{PK_AD_NUM}, #{AD_TITLE}, #{PK_SAWON_CODE}, #{AD_CONTENT}, #{AD_DOCSTATUS}, 1, #{PK_DOCTYPE_NUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AD_DEPT_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AD_DOCSIGNPATH, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), 'N')

SELECT NVL(MAX(PK_APPROVAL_NUM)+1, 0) FROM APPROVAL
INSERT INTO APPROVAL(PK_APPROVAL_NUM, FK_AD_NUM, APPROVAL_SSSTEP, APPROVAL_SSTYPE, APPROVAL_SSRESULT, APPROVAL_RECEIVE_DATE, PK_SAWON_CODE, APPROVAL_USER_POS) VALUES (#{PK_APPROVAL_NUM}, #{FK_AD_NUM}, #{APPROVAL_SSSTEP}, #{APPROVAL_SSTYPE}, #{APPROVAL_SSRESULT}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), #{PK_SAWON_CODE}, #{APPROVAL_USER_POS})
mapper.select: SELECT PK_AD_NUM, AD_TITLE, SD.PK_SAWON_CODE, SD.SAWON_NAME, AD_CONTENT, AD_DOCSTATUS, AD_DOCSTEP, PK_DOCTYPE_NUM, AD_DEPT_NAME, AD_MOD_DATE, AD_MOD_DATE, AD_DOCSIGNPATH FROM AD SD INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON SD.PK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE SD.AD_DELETEFLAG='N' AND PK_AD_NUM=#{PK_AD_NUM}
SELECT SS.PK_SAWON_CODE FROM AD SD INNER JOIN APPROVAL SS ON SS.FK_AD_NUM=SD.PK_AD_NUM AND SS.APPROVAL_SSSTEP=SD.AD_DOCSTEP WHERE SD.PK_AD_NUM=#{FK_AD_NUM} AND SD.AD_DOCSTATUS IN (1,2)

SELECT PK_APPROVAL_NUM, FK_AD_NUM, APPROVAL_SSSTEP, APPROVAL_SSTYPE, APPROVAL_SSRESULT, SD.PK_SAWON_CODE, CU.SAWON_NAME, SD.APPROVAL_USER_POS, APPROVAL_SIGN_DATE, APPROVAL_SSCOMMENT, photo FROM APPROVAL SD INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON SD.PK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE FULL OUTER JOIN APPROVAL_IMAGE AI ON SD.PK_SAWON_CODE=AI.PK_SAWON_CODE WHERE FK_AD_NUM=#{FK_AD_NUM} ORDER BY APPROVAL_SSSTEP

SELECT PK_APPROVAL_NUM, FK_AD_NUM, APPROVAL_SSSTEP, APPROVAL_SSTYPE, APPROVAL_SSRESULT, SD.PK_SAWON_CODE, SD.SAWON_NAME, CD.CODENM, APPROVAL_USER_POS FROM APPROVAL SD INNER JOIN SAWON CU ON SD.PK_SAWON_CODE=CU.PK_SAWON_CODE INNER JOIN COM_CODE CD ON CLASSNO='3' AND CD.CODECD=CU.RANK_NAME WHERE FK_AD_NUM IN( SELECT PK_AD_NUM FROM AD WHERE PK_SAWON_CODE=#{PK_SAWON_CODE} AND PK_DOCTYPE_NUM=#{PK_DOCTYPE_NUM} AND ROWNUM=1) ORDER BY APPROVAL_SSSTEP
SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FK_ATTACHMENT_DOCU_NUM=#{FK_ATTACHMENT_DOCU_NUM} ORDER BY FILENO DESC
